Episodes.Title: Thomas and the Firework Display
Episodes.Plot: Thomas wishes he could collect the fireworks stock to deliver to the Harvest Fireworks Display but feels most disappointed when James is chosen to do the job instead. James, however, breaks down.

Episodes.Title: Percy's New Whistle
Episodes.Plot: Whilst delivering trucks to the quarry, Percy whistles a greeting to 'Arry and Bert who laugh at Percy's whistle. Percy is determined to show the Diesels that his whistle is just as good as their horns. As Percy puffs through the countryside, he practices whistling loudly.

Episodes.Title: Fish
Episodes.Plot: A special load of fish is ordered and extra vans are needed for "The Flying Kipper" and, to Henry's annoyance, the only ones available are old and unsafe.

Episodes.Title: Emily's Adventure
Episodes.Plot: Emily finds that being unkind to others is the wrong thing to do when in need of help with a big job.

Episodes.Title: Squeak, Rattle and Roll
Episodes.Plot: Gordon thinks pulling the express makes him the most important engine on Sodor.

Episodes.Title: Thomas Saves the Day
Episodes.Plot: A new station is being built and it is Thomas' job to ferry the workmen to the new station and back again.

Episodes.Title: Edward the Great
Episodes.Plot: The Duke and Duchess of Boxford are visiting and Edward is to take their luggage to their summerhouse.

Episodes.Title: Thomas, Emily and the Snowplough
Episodes.Plot: Thomas pays no attention to Emily when she advises him to wear his snowplow to make it safely through the snowy drifts.

Episodes.Title: Spic and Span
Episodes.Plot: A railway inspector is coming, and all the engines are determined to win the Cleanest Engine Award. Thomas and Percy find this difficult to do...

Episodes.Title: James Goes Too Far
Episodes.Plot: When the other engines ask James for help with some hard jobs, he says he's much too busy with his assigned task of exporting loads of coal around the Island. However, when James breaks down, his attitude soon changes.
